description:
Servion is a global systems integrator (SI) headquartered in the United States, with over three decades in customer experience (CX) transformation. Backed by a team of over 1,000 employees across the world, Servion partners with some of the most iconic global brandsâ€”including Costco, Rogers, Roche, Farmers Insurance, and Citibankâ€”to design, deploy, and optimize customer service solutions that create lasting impact.

At the heart of Servionâ€™s approach is JourneyWorCXâ„¢, a proprietary CX execution framework that envisions a world where human connection is amplified through intelligent technology. JourneyWorCX empowers businesses to deliver exceptional customer journeys that not only delight users but also drive business growth and loyalty.

With deep expertise across multiple industries and technologies, Servionâ€™s mission is simple yet powerful: to make journeys that work. By harmonizing innovation with human insight, Servion ensures that every customer interaction becomes a catalyst for stronger relationships and sustained success.

Leadership Update at Servion

Weâ€™re excited to welcome Bruce Eidsvik as Servion Global Solutions' new Chief Growth Officer. With over two decades of experience in CX, enterprise software, and go-to-market leadership, Bruce has led marketing and growth teams across North America, EMEA, and APAC-driving commercial strategies that scale revenue and customer impact.

Bruce previously held senior roles at Genesys, where he helped transform global go-to-market operations during its shift to cloud-native CX solutions. He was part of the founding team at VoiceGenie, held leadership roles at OpenText, and most recently advised B2B software companies through The Revenue Consultancy.

At Servion, Bruce will help accelerate growth across new and existing markets, partnering with our executive team to strengthen marketing leadership, sales enablement, and cross-functional alignment. 

Please join us in giving Bruce a warm welcome to the Servion family!
